snippet: The agency’s decision on generic Opana ER came just weeks after it reached the opposite conclusion in the case of another frequently abused painkiller, OxyContin.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration announces generic versions of painkiller Opana ER can remain on market, dealing blow to brand-name manufacturer Endo Health Solutions, which had asked agency to declare generic versions unsafe.
lead_paragraph: The agency’s decision on generic Opana ER came just weeks after it reached the opposite conclusion in the case of another frequently abused painkiller, OxyContin.

headline.seo: Endo Loses Bid to Block Sales of Generic Painkiller
headline.main: F.D.A. Rejects Request to Block Sales of Generic Painkiller
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Rejects Request to Keep Generic Rivals of Painkiller Off the Market
